bloc1.title: Who I Am
bloc1.subtitle: A student at Polytech Tours in Computer Science, I have just completed a double degree at the University of Sherbrooke. Passionate about software development, I aim to specialize in DevOps, quality assurance, or project management in a stimulating environment.

bloc2.title: What I Am Looking For
bloc2.subtitle: Starting in January 2026, I am seeking my first job in France or Europe, within a caring, innovative, and committed team, to continue developing in a stimulating environment aligned with my values and to make an impact.
